Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard - Walk of Heroes
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs northeast to southwest.
Room.LongDescription: You are at the famed Walk of Heroes, where Oceancrest's braves fighters, mages and priests are commemorated in large bronze statues. The statues line Eidenhoft Boulevard on both sides of the road. To the southwest is the Oceancrest Memorial Fountain, commemorating those who gave their lives in battle. To the northeast, you can see Hillcrest Drive.
